attributes.action: Save Hamza Bendelladj of Algeria from death sentence. Withdraw death sentence.
attributes.background: Hamza Bendelladj being sentenced to death for hacking US banks and giving money to Palestine. Although stealing is not to be condoned, a death sentence is very severe after he has helped dying people in Palestine. So everyone please help him. If you think he's only done what Robin Hood has.

rejection.details:
You could start a petition asking the UK Government to put pressure on the US government to act in this case. 

You would also need to start the petition with your full name.
